overview:
Karl is the managing director of Online Expression. He has developed a wide range of working experience and skills in the online world. He specializes in web design and online advertising and also works as a graphic designer.

Karl graduated in 2002 with a degree in computer systems. He worked first as a graphic designer and then a web designer before travelling to live in London in 2005. In London he moved into the online advertising industry, working for one of the UKs leading advertising agencies for 4 years. During this time he worked in a management role within the company. He gained vast working knowledge of online advertising through creating 100’s of advertising campaigns for some of the leading websites in the UK.

Karl returned to New Zealand in 2009 and founded Online Expression. He has a strong passion for the internet and staying at the forefront of web design and online marketing technology.
